name: gpt-boost
description: Productivity-focused virtualization for faster, lighter ChatGPT conversations.

scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf dist/firefox dist/gpt-boost-firefox.xpi && mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp manifest_firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json && cp -R src icons dist/firefox/ && (cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../gpt-boost-firefox.xpi .)
scripts.sign:firefox: npm run build:firefox && web-ext sign --source-dir dist/firefox --channel=unlisted --api-key=$AMO_JWT_ISSUER --api-secret=$AMO_JWT_SECRET

author: Bram van der Giessen, Rich Alesi (punassuming)
